website_summaries.verdict: A close contender for our top selection; a good choice if you want a smart Samsung TV with QLED viewing.
pros: Generous 65-inch screen is satisfying for even avid TV enthusiasts
4K resolution with QLED technology equal an amazing viewing experience with lifelike image quality
TV is easy to set up, and remote is easy to use
cons: Interface is somewhat complicated to navigate
Price is higher but not out of line considering the amazing colors and contrasts

website_summaries.verdict: Excellent 4K image quality in a model that gives you four different size options, all at a great price.
pros: Very helpful smart capabilities simplify operation
Includes Ambient Mode, so you can personalize the screen when you're not watching TV
Screen sizes available between 55 and 82 inches
Extremely high level of contrast for true black display
cons: You may need to run firmware upgrades to make the most of the smart options

website_summaries.verdict: This flat UltraHD model packs a few extras like a voice-activated search and art displays.
pros: High dynamic range makes darks darker and bright colors brighter
Ambient Mode allows you to display art, push data such as weather or sports scores, or play music in the background
cons: Interface has annoying extras such as Samsung TV and movie content, ads, and apps

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNTIL YOU READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: Samsung QLEDs DO NOT work with HDMI CEC. The TVs always default to use the TV speakers when the set is turned on. This is a known problem and has been all over the Samsung forums since 2016. Samsung says they are unable to fix this problem. If you are using anything other than the TV speakers you will have to manually turn them on prior to turning the TV on every time to use them.
customer_reviews.author: AMen

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Price
customer_reviews.text: When the time came to upgrade to UHD I knew I wanted a Samsung. But I was torn between the Q6 and the Q8. I tried both and the Q8’s extra bells and whistles simply did not justify the price difference. The picture quality, sound, and smart features are great. It was a breeze to set up and program. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because the anti glare feature could be a bit better - it’s one area where the Q8 was clearly superior. The TV does an excellent job upscaling standard definition content and HD content looks nearly as crisp as UHD. I’m very happy with the TV.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant TV but beware of buying it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Crisp picture, vivid colors, gorgeous look, real nice TV. However I made a mistake and bought on Amazon promotion that promised 15% back. Ordering the TV clicking on the advertisement promising the 15% discount, found eventually that I got only 5% back. After lengthy communication with Amazon, I was told that the discount did not apply when bought from third party seller. Why was the order from third party seller available on the promotion banner is a mystery to me. The whole purchase left me with bitter feelings towards whole Amazon and all Samsung products. From now will think twice on to order anything of value here.
customer_reviews.author: Petr

customer_reviews.title: Two shipments with broken screen. Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I had the first TV arrive with what looked like a broken glass spider pattern when it was turned on at delivery. The second TV arrived and this time there was a large black rectangle with colored lines on the left side of the screen. The tv looks flimsy and plastic. The glass did not appear broken and the box did not appear to be abused or distressed.
customer_reviews.author: HEJ

customer_reviews.title: Great features. Smooth tv
customer_reviews.text: Great tv the picture is amazing. Especially good in 4K and on Netflix. Really like the smart hub that comes up when you turn it on. Very easy to control with simple remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, ARC HDMI works poorly
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. The remotes universal feature controls most out devices. Apple TV remote is sketchy. The tv should work seamlessly with our onkyo receiver but the TVs arc connection does not consistently work. Had to connect via the optical out instead. Sucks since that would have made the switching between Apple/cable/amazon pretty seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Tiko

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Tv was delivered and after being set up I realized the entire screen was covered in horozontal lines. After some time on the phone with Samsung customer service I was scheduled a date for a repair man to come fix it. The repair man has not shown up and after contacting amazon directly I was transferred to Samsung customer service without being told. This whole thing has been a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Newman

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Sony
customer_reviews.text: Bad panel. Verticle dark bars span panel. Dirty screen affect from warped spots. Can't play 4k content on Plex with wired connection, doesn't support direct play. Prominent ads. Remote is missing key buttons. It's just cheap. For this kind of money I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beechey

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE.......
customer_reviews.text: My problem started this way :..as they were unloading tv, one guy pushed the tv set unto the others shoulder, as I started to go onto porch to help first guy, the second guy calls me and hands down the clipboard to sign while first guy was in enclosed un room/porch he set it down hard..well , this was a Xmas present and didnt find out about damage until later...at first they set a return pick-up...in the meantime i ordered a different tv...by doing that, they said I refused to return the tv and they wouldnt take it back......a &2000.00 mistake
customer_reviews.author: Bellymeat

customer_reviews.title: Entry level on paper, pro feeling performance
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful piece of tech. 75" version was simple to lift/set up with just two smaller than average people. Out of box to watch time was 15 minutes. User interface really friendly. Distance between feet when assembled is between 58" and 60"
customer_reviews.author: TheJonAsher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this tv is amazing! We replaced a 10 year old Samsung and the difference is astounding. The colors are vivid, the detail is almost more than realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gumerman

customer_reviews.title: Has waves of light on a dark colored screen
customer_reviews.text: When the TV goes black (but is on) I can see waves of lighter color - not sure if this is a defect or just poor quality. Once I'm watching something its not noticeable but I'm sure its somehow affecting the overall picture. In the past I was a Sony TV buyer and never had these quality issues. Tried to save a buck. Otherwise its a nice looking TV with a nice price and works well with my Apple TV.
customer_reviews.author: gnomehole

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I am in the scene
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular resolution and color rendering. Feel like I am in the scene.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Randall

customer_reviews.title: WARNING for Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: Requires M8 x 45mm machine screws to wall mount. TV does not come with them. Most wall mount kits do not include them. Most hardware stores don't carry them. Order them when you order the tv. As for the tv, does a great job for gaming, great job watching fast moving sports, good job with movies. This isn't top of the line, but considering the price, is probably a better value for most than the more expensive models which give slight improvements at a much steeper cost.
customer_reviews.author: FleetingGame2000

customer_reviews.title: Best TV We Have Ever Owned!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to finally have a TV that makes watching it a whole new experience. Shipping took a couple extra days then expected but was delivered in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge Bravo TV fan. The first time I watched The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills after getting the TV, I was able to see that, despite Botox and fillers, these women do have wrinkles!! My dad is a TV snob and usually buys the most expensive of everything so I figured he’d have something bad to say. Instead he ooed and awed. I also love controlling it with Alexa. Where this loses a star is the poor voice recognition. I’ve never been able to get it to work well. The interface with the apps is a little cumbersome. For example, I have to select amazon videos twice; for some reason it doesn’t recognize the first click.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a tech expert or TV guru. This tv looks great on and off. With the sleek design and great picture I am very happy with this choice. Looks great watching everything from football to movies. Very fast
customer_reviews.author: Paul Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: The picture is amazing! The set up was so easy
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing! The set up was so easy, I did it all from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Most problematic electronic I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Endless quality problems with this TV. The motherboard had to be replaced within the first month of getting it. But first they said that I had a TV without a valid ID number so i had to send in all this verification crap. Now the “smart remote” won’t turn on my tv unless I unplug it and then plug it back in. It won’t even pair with the friggin’ Samsung sound bar I got for it half the time; it reverts back to the crappy TV speakers. I used to love Samsung quality...never ever again. I think they tried to cram it full of tech you don’t need or want, and those “bonuses” are half the problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gayler

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable picture, interface, support.
customer_reviews.text: Had questions. Possible doubts. It is a bit of money to spend on something. Questions gone. Doubts gone. Satisfaction is incredibly high. Easy to set up and use -- fantastic interface (and remarkably simple remote -- I like simple!). Picture quality is truly stunning. I have it raised about 5' off the floor and was worried ahead of time about viewing angle...not an issue at all. Partially because of the amazing screen size and also due to the picture quality. In terms of support, I had a question regarding how to get the local channels by using the antenna and was INCREDIBLY impressed by the Samsung online help at an off-time hour. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: gdouglas

customer_reviews.title: Dark band at bottom of two TVs purchased. Extra long 45mm M8 1.25 bolts required for mounting
customer_reviews.text: Great color, sound, and smart system. The back is curved so there needs to be longer bolts when mounting the TV. The bolts I used were 45mm long and these are M8 1.25 bolts that are needed. Noticed there is a dark band at the bottom of the screen. Requested for a replacement. Noticed the replacement still had the same issue but not as severe as the first. Currently waiting for a third replacement. Either the quality control on this product is non existent or I am extremely unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: Peppa Unboxing

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TV
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS PRIOR YEAR MODEL SO I GOT A GOOD PRICE FOR 65 INCH. EVERYTHING WORKS WELL. MY OPINION THE DISPLAY IN SHOPS FOR DIFFERENT PRICE TV IS NOT SO MUCH WHEN VIEWED AT HOME. SO IT IS NOT WORK TO SPEND HUGE DOLLAR AMOUNT TO BUY THE BEST DISPLAY. SPEND DECENT AMOUNT AND GET AS BIG DISPLAY AS POSSIBLE AND THEN CHANGE TV EVERY 3-4 YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Irfan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in March 2019. Have been using it for the last month. Picture is excellent. I have streamed from Netflix for 4k content. I also run DirecTV. I have zero complaints about the TV picture and Smart capabilities. The remote will take some getting used to. I have a spare Logitech Harmony remote that I will likely end up using instead of the remote that came with the TV. I would buy this TV again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Really love this TV. Aside from the awesome picture, the built-in apps (YouTube, Netflix, Prime, etc) make it simple to watch from any platform, but the really cool thing is how it automatically recognized my Apple TV and Roku boxes once they were hooked up. That also means the TV remote could be used instead of their remotes. Sound is actually very good for a flat screen, too. I still plan to hook up my home theater sound system, but the built-in sound is really good by itself. No regrets, this is a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: jslinkster

customer_reviews.title: I love IT - Could not have made a better choice
customer_reviews.text: I love IT - Could not have made a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Beran

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but smart TV features  works poorly
customer_reviews.text: The Samusng QN65Q6FN QLED TV has a great UHD 4K picture quality . Even the Up-scaling from broadcast HD (1080p) looks so good! The internal speakers sound ok for a very thin profile TV. The best sound of requires an external amplifier or sound bar. If you want to use the built in audio sources (Over the Air TV, Amazon Prime, Netflix, Youtube, etc...) you will need to connect an HDMI cable or an Optical cable from your TV to the external amplifier or soundbar. I found the interface and "smart hub" samsung puts on this TV is very poor..
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: You're an idiot if you dont buy it....
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these. Two in 65" and one in the 82" variant. I love them all and it made it much easier to cut the cord with directv and use Hulu live/Amazon/Netflix instead. I also have them tied into my Ring doorbell, Arlo cameras, and Smarthings smart home.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: 65 SAMSUNG QLED. rocks
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I am thrilled. my 5 year old PLASMA was awful on blacks--color was just OK.. Samsung, QLED is the beast--buy it, if you want to really see detail and colors as they were meant to be scene.. try Blacks are way better. the$1,500 is a good price for what you get--not liking the TV stand --much prefetching a stand rather than the 2 legs, a little tipsy----this set does not have the one control box now that is a nice to have feature .
customer_reviews.author: C. brown

customer_reviews.title: Defective Panel Just in Time for Warranty Expiry
customer_reviews.text: Screen/panel developed in the middle of the screen a little over 1yr... Just in time for warranty to expire. Contacted Samsung and was told warranty expired after 1yr. Someone would have to come out (for $230) and look at it but they think it’s a defective panel, and it will cost ~$1200 to replace/repair. So much for that... very disappointing, as it was an awesome TV right up to that point. Now it seems like a really bad investment in cheap electronics that the manufacturer will not hold themselves accountable for. Sad to say that the replacement TV will likely not be a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: CKP13

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks amazing.. the sound not quite so..
customer_reviews.text: I went about purchasing this television knowing and understanding that the sound would not be the best. I already consider beforehand in purchasing a home theater surround sound bar with 7.1.4 Dolby Atmos, so I wasn't too concern about the sound quality. To clarify.. the sound either gets really loud or quite dependent on what source you are on or watching.. adn it is not consistent. However, i will stress, this was a great buy and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago and I am extremely pleased with Samsungs QLED quality. The pictures provided are not as good as actually watching it. I wanted to purchase an OLED tv, but due to price and screen size this was a better purchase decision. Some reviews say that the side viewing angle is degraded, but I could not tell a measurable difference while sitting at 9 feet and about a 30-35 degree angle from tv. The remote links to all of my additional devices and makes operation much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn Welch

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: My specs were: 75" or above. 4k level 6 or above. QLED or OLED, HDR, Smart features. This was the only one I could find for my less than 2,000 budget. It arrived on time, intact, and was a breeze to setup. We had it up and running in under 20 minutes. Beautiful picture, super bright screen, awesome color and a welcome upgrade to the 10 year old 60" DLP 1080 screen it replaced. Samsung impresses once again! (the fact I have a Samsung Note phone played a small role in my purchase, as I have been extremely pleased with it for nearly 2 years.)
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful TV. Bought for my Husband who can be very critical if he's not part of a large purchase. This price was EXCELLENT but with QUALITY. I'll never compromise on quality. This TV delivers both picture & sound. WE don't game on it or use it's many features, except to have a great picture & sound with our movies.
customer_reviews.author: Ande

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Big and incredibly beautiful. What's not to like. Setup was simple even with connecting to receiver and other devices. Sound is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Samsung
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing! The picture is so clear and the features are great! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Something just isn’t right...
customer_reviews.text: If I had it to do over again, I probably wouldn’t buy this product. The TV display is great and it’s fairly easy to operate, but it has been problematic from the very beginning. When I turn the TV off, it automatically turns itself back on. The TV can be off for hours and all of a sudden it turns itself back on. Something is turning this TV on and it’s no human or animal residing in our home. I’ve reset the TV and it still reverts back to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This TV is lit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥! The picture quality is AWESOME in regular HD, 1080i/p and 4K is the best I’ve seen so far. This 65 QLED replaces a 55 Vizeo and the difference is greatly noticeable in every aspect. I’m very particular when it comes to TV and sound quality and this pleases me right! Go ahead and get it! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Butler

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: If you're searching for a great deal on a 75" tv, then this is the one for you. The tv is heavy, so if you're wanting to hang it on the wall, you might need more than two people (trust me). The quality and sound is perfect, and the apps load fast. I love how it connects to my smart fridge and ring door bell. I recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: griff_fam

customer_reviews.title: No Compatible Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a keyboard so browsing would be easier. Samsung is NO HELP. Their parts division only lists 4 keyboards and NONE are compatible with QN65Q6FN ; I got sick and tired of holding after 30 minutes. This is a great TV, but difficult to use and even worse support. I should have bought an LG. The picture and other features are great, but web browsing sucks without a keyboard to enter longer URLs.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Stein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Had to upgrade my theater projector to prevent watching everything in our living room! It would be awesome if they made a Nest app so I can stream my cameras without using an external device.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetsation

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This Tv is amazing and the apps on it eliminate the need for a roku. Simple sleek remote with only the few buttons you actually need. Set up was easy. Synced with our samsung smart hub making it easy to control from your phone and also with Amazon Alexa products. Did I mention the picture is amazing?
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly blown away
customer_reviews.text: I have never ever bought a refurbished/opened box item before, but I took a chance and got this couple months ago. Happy to say that I am soooooo so glad that I bought this Samsung TV! Besides the fact that there was the slightest(I truly mean VERRRY slight, you'll only kind of notice it in certain angles) bend on the top left corner of the tv, everything works like brand new! 10/10 definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware issues
customer_reviews.text: This TV is decent but has a worse picture quality than my previous LG set, regardless of calibration. However, I've had constant issues with the TV detecting input from my A/V receiver, which I haven't seen on any other TV I've tried. It's something with this TV itself. I don't think I'll be buying a Samsung the next go around.
customer_reviews.author: beedle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Bad picture quality. I like Samsung but this is not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV if you want a smooth clean picture. After changing picture settings it never really got any better. It is very shifty in fast moving environments. If you play video games or like watching sports I would not buy this TV. At over $1000 there are better choices. This TV had a worse picture than my 40 inch vizio and my 50 inch Panasonic. Very disappointed. Product has been returned. Now just waiting on my refund
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: While I admit I don't use the smart features all that much, the picture quality is 2nd to none. Had the TV for a year and 2 months and its still running great. Sound is very good for a TV. The TV remote is okay, but we use our cable remote mostly. I bought the 75". You can't go wrong with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: We love the picture of this tv! The smart features were great at first, but when you try and use them for streaming, everything lags or freezes. We upgraded our internet thinking that was it, so such luck. When we added the 4K Fire Stick, solved every problem! Including the remote issues. The remote isn’t balanced well. We could never get it to control our Samsung sound bar. The remote features work different on every app. Like I mentioned, once we added the Fire Stick - all fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meagher

customer_reviews.title: 1st time ordering something like this
customer_reviews.text: This was our first time ordering something so big in the mail. Just be smart and look at the TV before the delivery guy has you sign papers. Also, be prepared to wait on a phone call from the delivery team before they'll even stop by. We were waiting an extra week because we didn't know they'd call to set up a appointment to drop it off. No fault of Amazon or the seller, just something to note. TV has been working for the last 2 months and is awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Boner

customer_reviews.title: Not Crazy About the Remote...Yet.
customer_reviews.text: We L-O-V-E our new QLED TV. This thing is a monster and the picture is stunning. It does, occasionally, have the "jitters", but that seams to be with non 4K movies (I believe it's trying to up convert) . One other complaint is the remote, it's very sparse and not real intuitive, hopefully I'll get used to it. Other than that, so far, I love my television.
customer_reviews.author: clearly deranged

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful picture!
customer_reviews.text: So happy we purchased this tv. The price was better than Costco, the picture quality is incredible- like you can actually SEE what is happening during night scenes- and when we forget to turn on the sound bar, the sound isn’t horrible like most tv’s. Set up was super simple (we run it through our Apple tv). No regrets at all on this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: It adds a strange spatial effect to movies that I hate.
customer_reviews.text: No one else in my family notices it but it drives me nuts. To me it makes classic and new moves look like bad soap operas made in mexico. I can't explain the effect beyond that. It's also very slow to load apps like you tube. But it was super cheap so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Quantus

customer_reviews.title: So Happy with my new TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, amazingly BIG and CAPTIVATING! Watching planet earth I feel like I'm there in the arctic with the penguins. Coupled with the Samsung sound bar and woofer, I don't ever need to go to the movie theater again. I don't want to work I just want to go home and watch shows and play my PS4 Pro on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin Bassett

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality, user interface, and sound are all great. Sound being relative to other built-in TV speakers I've had. The user-interface is snappy af. I have no patience for any of my other smart TV's or Roku sticks after using this one. One problem: remote fails to pair sometimes. It can be annoying. But it resolves itself within 30 seconds. I tried the most expensive Vizio model and the picture quality sucked compared to this. I think the more expensive models (Q7, Q8) are worth the price, judging by in-store comparison, if you can afford it, but if you can't, this is a very good compromise and worth every penny if you get in on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I got my Samsung a week before Thanksgiving and after a month I am very pleased overall. When watching 4K content the colors are so vibrant what’s not to like? So far I haven’t found anything I don't like about this this TV. The remote is that comes with the TV isn't the best, but I have a Harmony One universal remote I use instead and have zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color and clarity. Remote is bit confusion but can be managed. The only nightmare is the system settings. It will grey some functions but without let you know why. I had to read the manual or search Internet to find out. Kind of not user friendly. I have it for a year now/\
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Had for over a yr best purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I took a chance an got this. Had it for over a yr now and knock on wood couldn’t be happier with everything about this tv but the price seemed to good to be such a nice tv but because it was a Samsung I went ahead and I’ve been happy since
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best TV!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is awesome. The picture quality is fantastic, it was easy to set up, the sound is perfect for a large living room - no additional sound bar needed. The remote can be better because it’s limited when it comes to DIRECTV options but other than that, I have absolutely no complaints about this TV. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ccc555

customer_reviews.title: Buy Samsung TVs they work and no one has a better picture
customer_reviews.text: This has become our primary TV and the picture, ease of set up, all were wonderful! This will definitely not be my last Samsung TV. It was not my first either!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Paul

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TV!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this tv for a year now. It is beautiful! Color, quality, sound, love everything about it! The remote control could be a little bit more user friendly though. Otherwise that (knock on wood) I hope to enjoy it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: prior to purchasing I read all reviews. The good out weighed the bad, so I took a chance and i'm glad I did this is the most awesome TV I have owned. I currently have a 55" 3-d Sony TV that is really difficult to maneuver through the features and apps. the picture is great the sound is wonderful and I am truly glad I purchased this TV . If anything changes I will update but for now I am happy
customer_reviews.author: pered2

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the great picture and was not disappointed. The sound is not premium but I'm OK with that. The TV's mounting system worked well for me because I have a cable DVR that fits perfectly in between the split legs. Happy with the cable concealment system as well, the table top where everything sits is very clean and free of clutter. Really happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great! This is my first "4k" smart television so I really can't compare to anything, but I'm very satisfied with this one. Sound bar or some sort of sound system is a must. They do cheap out on the built in speaks but that's a small price to pay for a great view and amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: eh.  its ok
customer_reviews.text: really not a good picture. very blue, and washed out. guess my Plasma spoiled me all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Clearest Picture Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is unreal! Looks like you are live, in the show/game - but much larger! Not wild about the "Samsung" tracking that you have to agree to for use of internet connection, so we are not using that. But for a TV this is a great TV!
customer_reviews.author: RD Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Manual is Lacking, but Great Pictutre once you get it set up.
customer_reviews.text: The manual is really short on the meat. I guess they figured this TV is sooooo smart it really didn't need a manual. You have to dive into the menu on the TV to get it set up properly. The good is that the picture quality is very good. Almost life like.
customer_reviews.author: lars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent (Q)LED TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality, resolution, and brightness. Easy to setup with smart features and built-in apps. Good universal remote. However, I’m unable to get the TV to sync with my Onlyo HTS such that it all powers up and down in sync.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this...
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far..... only had for I night, so still figuring it out. 4k is awesome . The depth is like your right there. Bixby voice is nice, doesn't always pick up what your saying. Speak loud and clear. It can adjust settings etc.. way more than just changing channels. We have direct tv, we can use either remote. You can use your phone as a remote. So far I'd say awesome...
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sweet TV, great picture, pleasing aesthetically. When the smart features on the remote are working properly it’s fine but on the occasion that they’re not I would prefer to be able to change the channel manually via number pad. Also, I had to play around with the settings to avoid sporadic audio cut-out on my optical surround sound system. But as I said, I think it’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tv!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new tv! The Qled is awesome. We have a lot of windows in our home. True to Qoed promise the lighting in the tv works well even with light coming in the windows. The picture is awesome. But my old tv was over 10 years old, so I imagine anything new would look awesome. Having said that, it really does have awesome picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cuddeback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Built in YouTube and wifi is awesome. Fantastic picture quality. Remote was a pleasant surprise. Would buy again. Wish it had Bluetooth out so we could use headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tv
customer_reviews.text: One of the best TVs we have bought. Has wonderful picture quality and looks really nice mounted on the wall or on it stands. Overall great quality. Recommend Samsung for any device. Safe and on-time shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is amazing, if you know how to calibrate the screen you can get a much better picture than out of box, but out of box it’s a great tv also.
customer_reviews.author: R M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture and colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture quality, and the vivid colors that just seem to pop off the screen! I have it hooked up to a soundbar, so they sound quality that some complain about is not an issue. And with the 240 refresh rate, even our cats LOVE to watch TV now, especially shows with birds and butterflies in them!
customer_reviews.author: Patty O'Furniture

customer_reviews.title: It's a Samsung QLED, its amazing, duh
customer_reviews.text: I'm a firm believer its hard to beat the Samsung QLED series, it's just bananas. I have an older NON 4K Samsung and it still looks better than my LG 4K tv. If Samsung continues this path, I will ONLY ever buy Samsung TV's. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: uwilhavthat

customer_reviews.title: Failure after a year.
customer_reviews.text: great tv. was going to get oled, but this picture has excellent blacks. One year later, the tv has darkness several inches wide in the middle as if some backlit piece isn't lit. What a disappointment. Do these things have any kind of guarantee?
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Great tv.  Excellent price....
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv. Heavier than I thought it would be as replacing a smaller Samsung but great sharp pic with excellent color. I do tweak settings a little just for us....had seen it at a friends and waited for price drop...excellent buy....
customer_reviews.author: baw53

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a great price !
customer_reviews.text: The TV was just as promised. The company did a great job shipping it to me and their customer service is outstanding !! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV ever
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright display that this model provides even in bright ceiling lights in present and like the additional natural color enhancement inner signal processing chip they developed. Thumbs up on everything. One thing I struggled was a Macpro computer to HDMI connector but found HDMI1 is for input only for other use. If connect Macpro to HDMI2, the problem went away.
customer_reviews.author: PKK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. Set up is very fast and easy. vibrant colors. I would say, pay attention who you buy it from...from what I read some had issues with Samsung customer service, which led me to buying it from Amazon itself...Amazon even honored the change of price when I noticed it before it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Sherif

customer_reviews.title: From a bum phone in the early years to the best picture on earth!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture never been happier! I had gotten a Samsung phone when I was younger and it was absolutely terrible! I was reluctant to get another Samsung product after the experience with the phone but I was highly recommend this tv by my friend. I took his word and the tv has restored my faith in the name brand! I would even consider getting a Samsung phone again!
customer_reviews.author: stephen binkley

customer_reviews.title: tv great , but remote control is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: tv great , but remote control is HORRIBLE! how can Samsung increase technology on the tv and reduce buttons on the remote control. Hate the remote!!! I gave it 4 start because now i have to buy a remote control
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great television
customer_reviews.text: Love this television! Whenever I’ve had a question about something, I can call Samsung CustomerSupport and they can take control of my tv and take care of whatever it needs! Woah, way cool! 😎
customer_reviews.author: Janette Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV for almost a year now and we just love it! People always comment on its picture quality and size. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend or buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY: Automatic HDMI Switching Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I will never, ever buy another Samsung SmartTV again. This TV automatically switches between HDMI inputs. It's buggy. It doesn't work. I have to unplug and replug my AppleTV, Playstation, and Mac several times a day. There's a 52-page thread about this bug on the Samsung forums. Samsung won't fix it. Even though this TV is 10 months old and I paid $1600, I'm going to have to sell it and buy something else. It's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Outside packaging was only slightly damaged, but upon setup, display was obviously cracked and there was no picture when TV was turned on. Skeptical to order another after return is complete...
customer_reviews.author: In_my_opinion

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: First of all, Samsung, stop making short power cables. What are you thinking? Secondly, have you ever heard of frustration free packaging? Well, this is the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, easily destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV less than a year. The screen was accidentally smashed and not worth fixing so it becomes a landfill item now. The picture was good, the sound could have been better. Smart features are lacking like the browser will only allow you to use Samsung version.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be beat for price
customer_reviews.text: The closest to this is nearly 4thousand. The picture quality is amazing and beats any I’ve seen at anyone’s house. For a 65 in this price just can’t be beat. I paid a lil over 1k at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound and picture.
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV. Its everything you can ask for. I like that the border on the screen is only on top and bottom edge. Sound quality is great. You can hide the wires in the back. Bluetooth is nice. Picture quality is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Torch

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get it but I know is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get this item for delivery issues but I'm convinced is a great item
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Screen Discoloration
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a fan of Samsung products but unfortunately this product arrived defective. Although I bought it new, the right side of the screen was very discolored as there was a large, visible black line from the bottom of the screen to the top. This is very disappointing as the TV was already mounted and now needs to be repackaged and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Live it
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV, the pictures is super clear and and beautiful. I was concerned the picture bright and sharp will make my eyes tight if watching it too long, but it doesn't make my eyes tired. Very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and good value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, good sound, easy to use features, all at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: HCC

customer_reviews.title: WORST TV I EVER SEEN!
customer_reviews.text: LOOK HOW IS PICTURE QUALITY IN PHOTOT. Im sodisappointed Samsung. Never will buy again Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: anvar

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the TV. Yes, I could have chased newer technology (never ending) but in the end, this is a great TV. I purchased a Samsung Sound bar to go with the TV and together the experience is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good TV and Good value
customer_reviews.text: As expected. I installed Amazon Fire stick to improve smart TV functions.
customer_reviews.author: mr careful

customer_reviews.title: Right after one year warranty expired the picture went bad
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of money on the TV and right after the one warranty expired the Picture started to ghost/get blurry and white spots started showing in the left lower corner. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Westgate

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Lasted 5 weeks and picture went out. Read ALL the reviews this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment You Can Make !
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy of my life ! Extraordinary picture,plenty of apps . Backlit this with led’s and it went from extraordinary to out of this world !
customer_reviews.author: Odjida

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of the best If you ask me Love the tv The picture is so bright and perfect Feels like your in the tv So clear
customer_reviews.author: Travis D. Meche

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even survive a week
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. After a few days, the TV went to sh*t. The only reason why I gave it 2 stars was when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

product_meta.title: Samsung QN65Q6FN FLAT 65” QLED 4K UHD 6 Series Smart TV 2018
product_meta.description: The eye will savor the 2018 Q6. Welcome to the prestigious QLED lineup that tantalizes your vision with 1 billion+ shades of Q Color while Ambient Mode alters the screen into a spectacular visual display. See colors in movies and shows pop, just as the director intended, in stunning high dynamic range. QLED TVs meet the highest 4K Ultra High-Definition standards as defined by the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA). Burn-in is when station logos, stock tickers, or other images linger on your screen. But, with Samsung QLED TVs you don't have to worry because all QLED TVs are 100% guaranteed against burn-in. Meet Bixby, your intelligent voice assistant in your new 2018 QLED TV. Bixby makes it easy to search for content, flip channels, or even ask questions such as the current weather using only your voice. Just click voice recognition on your remote or mobile, and Bixby is at your command. Have several smart devices to manage? No problem. Simply download SmartThings App on your mobile to control and monitor your new QLED TV and connected devices all in one screen!
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: With Stand 56.9" W x 35.8" H x 11.2" D | Without Stand 56.9" W x 2.2" D x 32.8" H
Q Contrast: Experience dramatic depth from the darkest to brightest scenes
Q HDR: See colors in movies and shows pop, just as the director intended, in stunning high dynamic range
Q Style: A thoughtful design with a clean cable solution allows you to focus on a TV without the clutter.

Ambient Mode: With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information, your own photos, and even some background music You won’t notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor

Smart TV with Bixby Voice: A revolutionary way to help find streaming and live TV shows with a universal guide, OneRemote and voice assistance. Sound Output (RMS): 40 Watt. Typical Power Consumption: 124

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars391 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
